verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) Remember, <WH2142> O Lord, <WH3068> on David's behalf, All <WH3605> his affliction; <WH6031>
How <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to the Lord, <WH3068> And vowed <WH5087> to the Mighty <WH46> One <WH46> of Jacob, <WH3290>
"Surely <WH518> I will not enter <WH935> my house, <WH1004> Nor <WH518> lie <WH5927> on my bed <WH6210>; <WH3326>
I will not give <WH5414> sleep <WH8142> to my eyes, <WH5869> Or slumber <WH8572> to my eyelids; <WH6079>
Until <WH5704> I find <WH4672> a place <WH4725> for the Lord, <WH3068> A dwelling <WH4908> place <WH4908> for the Mighty <WH46> One <WH46> of Jacob. <WH3290> "
Behold, <WH2009> we heard <WH8085> of it in Ephrathah; <WH672> We found <WH4672> it in the field <WH7704> of Jaar. <WH9194>
Let us go <WH935> into His dwelling <WH4908> place; <WH4908> Let us worship <WH7812> at His footstool. <WH1916> <WH7272>
Arise, <WH6965> O Lord, <WH3068> to Thy resting <WH4496> place; <WH4496> Thou and the ark <WH727> of Thy strength. <WH5797>
Let Thy priests <WH3548> be clothed <WH3847> with righteousness; <WH6664> And let Thy godly <WH2623> ones <WH2623> sing <WH7442> for joy. <WH7442>
For the sake <WH5668> of David <WH1732> Thy servant, <WH5650> Do not turn <WH7725> away <WH7725> the face <WH6440> of Thine anointed. <WH4899>

The Lord <WH3068> has sworn <WH7650> to David, <WH1732> A truth <WH571> from which He will not turn <WH7725> back; <WH7725> "Of the fruit <WH6529> of your body <WH990> I will set <WH7896> upon your throne. <WH3678>

"If <WH518> your sons <WH1121> will keep <WH8104> My covenant, <WH1285> And My testimony <WH9381> which <WH2097> I will teach <WH3925> them, Their sons <WH1121> also <WH1571> shall sit <WH3427> upon your throne <WH3678> forever. <WH5703>"
For the Lord <WH3068> has chosen <WH977> Zion; <WH6726> He has desired <WH183> it for His habitation. <WH4186>
"This <WH384> is My resting <WH4496> place <WH4496> forever; <WH5703> Here <WH6311> I will dwell, <WH3427> for I have desired <WH183> it.
"I will abundantly <WH1288> bless <WH1288> her provision; <WH9479> I will satisfy <WH7646> her needy <WH34> with bread. <WH3899>
"Her priests <WH3548> also I will clothe <WH3847> with salvation; <WH3468> And her godly <WH2623> ones <WH2623> will sing <WH7442> aloud <WH7442> for joy. <WH7442>
"There <WH8033> I will cause the horn <WH7161> of David <WH1732> to spring <WH6779> forth; <WH6779> I have prepared <WH6186> a lamp <WH5216> for Mine anointed. <WH4899>
"His enemies <WH340> I will clothe <WH3847> with shame; <WH1322> But upon himself his crown <WH5145> shall shine. <WH6692>"
